trans-unit.source: Use Tez UI with Windows-based HDInsight | Azure
trans-unit.target: Use Tez UI with Windows-based HDInsight | Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use the Tez UI to debug Tez jobs on Windows-based HDInsight HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use the Tez UI to debug Tez jobs on Windows-based HDInsight HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: Use the Tez UI to debug Tez Jobs on Windows-based HDInsight
trans-unit.target: Use the Tez UI to debug Tez Jobs on Windows-based HDInsight

trans-unit.source: The Tez UI is a web page that can be used to understand and debug jobs that use Tez as the execution engine on Windows-based HDInsight clusters.
trans-unit.target: The Tez UI is a web page that can be used to understand and debug jobs that use Tez as the execution engine on Windows-based HDInsight clusters.

trans-unit.source: The Tez UI allows you to visualize the job as a graph of connected items, drill into each item, and retrieve statistics and logging information.
trans-unit.target: The Tez UI allows you to visualize the job as a graph of connected items, drill into each item, and retrieve statistics and logging information.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] The information in this document is specific to Windows-based HDInsight clusters.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] The information in this document is specific to Windows-based HDInsight clusters.

trans-unit.source: For information on viewing and debugging Tez on Linux-based HDInsight, see [Use Ambari Views to debug Tez jobs on HDInsight](hdinsight-debug-ambari-tez-view.md).
trans-unit.target: For information on viewing and debugging Tez on Linux-based HDInsight, see [Use Ambari Views to debug Tez jobs on HDInsight](hdinsight-debug-ambari-tez-view.md).

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: Prerequisites

trans-unit.source: A Windows-based HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: A Windows-based HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: For steps on creating a new cluster, see [Get started using Windows-based HDInsight](hdinsight-hadoop-tutorial-get-started-windows.md).
trans-unit.target: For steps on creating a new cluster, see [Get started using Windows-based HDInsight](hdinsight-hadoop-tutorial-get-started-windows.md).

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] The Tez UI is only available on Windows-based HDInsight clusters created after February 8th, 2016.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] The Tez UI is only available on Windows-based HDInsight clusters created after February 8th, 2016.

trans-unit.source: A Windows-based Remote Desktop client.
trans-unit.target: A Windows-based Remote Desktop client.

trans-unit.source: Understanding Tez
trans-unit.target: Understanding Tez

trans-unit.source: Tez is an extensible framework for data processing in Hadoop that provides greater speeds than traditional MapReduce processing.
trans-unit.target: Tez is an extensible framework for data processing in Hadoop that provides greater speeds than traditional MapReduce processing.

trans-unit.source: For Windows-based HDInsight clusters, it is an optional engine that you can enable for Hive by using the following command as part of your Hive query:
trans-unit.target: For Windows-based HDInsight clusters, it is an optional engine that you can enable for Hive by using the following command as part of your Hive query:

trans-unit.source: When work is submitted to Tez, it creates a Directed Acyclic Graph (DAG) that describes the order of execution of the actions required by the job.
trans-unit.target: When work is submitted to Tez, it creates a Directed Acyclic Graph (DAG) that describes the order of execution of the actions required by the job.

trans-unit.source: Individual actions are called vertices, and execute a piece of the overall job.
trans-unit.target: Individual actions are called vertices, and execute a piece of the overall job.

trans-unit.source: The actual execution of the work described by a vertex is called a task, and may be distributed across multiple nodes in the cluster.
trans-unit.target: The actual execution of the work described by a vertex is called a task, and may be distributed across multiple nodes in the cluster.

trans-unit.source: Understanding the Tez UI
trans-unit.target: Understanding the Tez UI

trans-unit.source: The Tez UI is a web page provides information on processes that are running, or have previously ran using Tez.
trans-unit.target: The Tez UI is a web page provides information on processes that are running, or have previously ran using Tez.

trans-unit.source: It allows you to view the DAG generated by Tez, how it is distributed across clusters, counters such as memory used by tasks and vertices, and error information.
trans-unit.target: It allows you to view the DAG generated by Tez, how it is distributed across clusters, counters such as memory used by tasks and vertices, and error information.

trans-unit.source: It may offer useful information in the following scenarios:
trans-unit.target: It may offer useful information in the following scenarios:

trans-unit.source: Monitoring long-running processes, viewing the progress of map and reduce tasks.
trans-unit.target: Monitoring long-running processes, viewing the progress of map and reduce tasks.

trans-unit.source: Analyzing historical data for successful or failed processes to learn how processing could be improved or why it failed.
trans-unit.target: Analyzing historical data for successful or failed processes to learn how processing could be improved or why it failed.

trans-unit.source: Generate a DAG
trans-unit.target: Generate a DAG

trans-unit.source: The Tez UI will only contain data if a job that uses the Tez engine is currently running, or has been ran in the past.
trans-unit.target: The Tez UI will only contain data if a job that uses the Tez engine is currently running, or has been ran in the past.

trans-unit.source: Simple Hive queries can usually be resolved without using Tez, however more complex queries that do filtering, grouping, ordering, joins, etc. will usually require Tez.
trans-unit.target: Simple Hive queries can usually be resolved without using Tez, however more complex queries that do filtering, grouping, ordering, joins, etc. will usually require Tez.

trans-unit.source: Use the following steps to run a Hive query that will execute using Tez.
trans-unit.target: Use the following steps to run a Hive query that will execute using Tez.

trans-unit.source: In a web browser, navigate to https://CLUSTERNAME.azurehdinsight.net, where __CLUSTERNAME__ is the name of your HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: In a web browser, navigate to https://CLUSTERNAME.azurehdinsight.net, where __CLUSTERNAME__ is the name of your HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: From the menu at the top of the page, select the __Hive Editor__.
trans-unit.target: From the menu at the top of the page, select the __Hive Editor__.

trans-unit.source: This will display a page with the following example query.
trans-unit.target: This will display a page with the following example query.

trans-unit.source: Erase the example query and replace it with the following.
trans-unit.target: Erase the example query and replace it with the following.

trans-unit.source: Select the __Submit__ button.
trans-unit.target: Select the __Submit__ button.

trans-unit.source: The __Job Session__ section at the bottom of the page will display the status of the query.
trans-unit.target: The __Job Session__ section at the bottom of the page will display the status of the query.

trans-unit.source: Once the status changes to __Completed__, select the __View Details__ link to view the results.
trans-unit.target: Once the status changes to __Completed__, select the __View Details__ link to view the results.

trans-unit.source: The __Job Output__ should be similar to the following:
trans-unit.target: The __Job Output__ should be similar to the following:

trans-unit.source: Use the Tez UI
trans-unit.target: Use the Tez UI

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] The Tez UI is only available from the desktop of the cluster head nodes, so you must use Remote Desktop to connect to the head nodes.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] The Tez UI is only available from the desktop of the cluster head nodes, so you must use Remote Desktop to connect to the head nodes.

trans-unit.source: From the [Azure portal](https://portal.azure.com), select your HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: From the [Azure portal](https://portal.azure.com), select your HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: From the top of the HDInsight blade, select the __Remote Desktop__ icon.
trans-unit.target: From the top of the HDInsight blade, select the __Remote Desktop__ icon.

trans-unit.source: This will display the remote desktop blade
trans-unit.target: This will display the remote desktop blade

trans-unit.source: ![Remote desktop icon](./media/hdinsight-debug-tez-ui/remotedesktopicon.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Remote desktop icon](./media/hdinsight-debug-tez-ui/remotedesktopicon.png)

trans-unit.source: From the Remote Desktop blade, select __Connect__ to connect to the cluster head node.
trans-unit.target: From the Remote Desktop blade, select __Connect__ to connect to the cluster head node.

trans-unit.source: When prompted, use the cluster Remote Desktop user name and password to authenticate the connection.
trans-unit.target: When prompted, use the cluster Remote Desktop user name and password to authenticate the connection.

trans-unit.source: ![Remote desktop connect icon](./media/hdinsight-debug-tez-ui/remotedesktopconnect.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Remote desktop connect icon](./media/hdinsight-debug-tez-ui/remotedesktopconnect.png)

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] If you have not enabled Remote Desktop connectivity, provide a user name, password, and expiration date, then select __Enable__ to enable Remote Desktop.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] If you have not enabled Remote Desktop connectivity, provide a user name, password, and expiration date, then select __Enable__ to enable Remote Desktop.

trans-unit.source: Once it has been enabled, use the previous steps to connect.
trans-unit.target: Once it has been enabled, use the previous steps to connect.

trans-unit.source: Once connected, open Internet Explorer on the remote desktop, select the gear icon in the upper right of the browser, and then select __Compatibility View Settings__.
trans-unit.target: Once connected, open Internet Explorer on the remote desktop, select the gear icon in the upper right of the browser, and then select __Compatibility View Settings__.

trans-unit.source: From the bottom of __Compatibility View Settings__, clear the check box for __Display intranet sites in Compatibility View__ and __Use Microsoft compatibility lists__, and then select __Close__.
trans-unit.target: From the bottom of __Compatibility View Settings__, clear the check box for __Display intranet sites in Compatibility View__ and __Use Microsoft compatibility lists__, and then select __Close__.

trans-unit.source: In Internet Explorer, browse to http://headnodehost:8188/tezui/#/.
trans-unit.target: In Internet Explorer, browse to http://headnodehost:8188/tezui/#/.

trans-unit.source: This will display the Tez UI
trans-unit.target: This will display the Tez UI

trans-unit.source: ![Tez UI](./media/hdinsight-debug-tez-ui/tezui.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Tez UI](./media/hdinsight-debug-tez-ui/tezui.png)

trans-unit.source: When the Tez UI loads, you will see a list of DAGs that are currently running, or have been ran on the cluster.
trans-unit.target: When the Tez UI loads, you will see a list of DAGs that are currently running, or have been ran on the cluster.

trans-unit.source: The default view includes the Dag Name, Id, Submitter, Status, Start Time, End Time, Duration, Application ID, and Queue.
trans-unit.target: The default view includes the Dag Name, Id, Submitter, Status, Start Time, End Time, Duration, Application ID, and Queue.

trans-unit.source: More columns can be added using the gear icon at the right of the page.
trans-unit.target: More columns can be added using the gear icon at the right of the page.

trans-unit.source: If you have only one entry, it will be for the query that you ran in the previous section.
trans-unit.target: If you have only one entry, it will be for the query that you ran in the previous section.

trans-unit.source: If you have multiple entries, you can search by entering search criteria in the fields above the DAGs, then hit __Enter__.
trans-unit.target: If you have multiple entries, you can search by entering search criteria in the fields above the DAGs, then hit __Enter__.

trans-unit.source: Select the __Dag Name__ for the most recent DAG entry.
trans-unit.target: Select the __Dag Name__ for the most recent DAG entry.

trans-unit.source: This will display information about the DAG, as well as the option to download a zip of JSON files that contain information about the DAG.
trans-unit.target: This will display information about the DAG, as well as the option to download a zip of JSON files that contain information about the DAG.

trans-unit.source: ![DAG Details](./media/hdinsight-debug-tez-ui/dagdetails.png)
trans-unit.target: ![DAG Details](./media/hdinsight-debug-tez-ui/dagdetails.png)

trans-unit.source: Above the __DAG Details__ are several links that can be used to display information about the DAG.
trans-unit.target: Above the __DAG Details__ are several links that can be used to display information about the DAG.

trans-unit.source: __DAG Counters__ displays counters information for this DAG.
trans-unit.target: __DAG Counters__ displays counters information for this DAG.

trans-unit.source: __Graphical View__ displays a graphical representation of this DAG.
trans-unit.target: __Graphical View__ displays a graphical representation of this DAG.

trans-unit.source: __All Vertices__ displays a list of the vertices in this DAG.
trans-unit.target: __All Vertices__ displays a list of the vertices in this DAG.

trans-unit.source: __All Tasks__ displays a list of the tasks for all vertices in this DAG.
trans-unit.target: __All Tasks__ displays a list of the tasks for all vertices in this DAG.

trans-unit.source: __All TaskAttempts__ displays information about the attempts to run tasks for this DAG.
trans-unit.target: __All TaskAttempts__ displays information about the attempts to run tasks for this DAG.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] If you scroll the column display for Vertices, Tasks and TaskAttempts, notice that there are links to view __counters__ and __view or download logs__ for each row.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] If you scroll the column display for Vertices, Tasks and TaskAttempts, notice that there are links to view __counters__ and __view or download logs__ for each row.

trans-unit.source: If there was a failure with the job, the DAG Details will display a status of FAILED, along with links to information about the failed task.
trans-unit.target: If there was a failure with the job, the DAG Details will display a status of FAILED, along with links to information about the failed task.

trans-unit.source: Diagnostics information will be displayed beneath the DAG details.
trans-unit.target: Diagnostics information will be displayed beneath the DAG details.

trans-unit.source: Select __Graphical View__.
trans-unit.target: Select __Graphical View__.

trans-unit.source: This displays a graphical representation of the DAG.
trans-unit.target: This displays a graphical representation of the DAG.

trans-unit.source: You can place the mouse over each vertex in the view to display information about it.
trans-unit.target: You can place the mouse over each vertex in the view to display information about it.

trans-unit.source: ![Graphical view](./media/hdinsight-debug-tez-ui/dagdiagram.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Graphical view](./media/hdinsight-debug-tez-ui/dagdiagram.png)

trans-unit.source: Clicking on a vertex will load the __Vertex Details__ for that item.
trans-unit.target: Clicking on a vertex will load the __Vertex Details__ for that item.

trans-unit.source: Click on the __Map 1__ vertex to display details for this item.
trans-unit.target: Click on the __Map 1__ vertex to display details for this item.

trans-unit.source: Select __Confirm__ to confirm the navigation.
trans-unit.target: Select __Confirm__ to confirm the navigation.

trans-unit.source: ![Vertex details](./media/hdinsight-debug-tez-ui/vertexdetails.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Vertex details](./media/hdinsight-debug-tez-ui/vertexdetails.png)

trans-unit.source: Note that you now have links at the top of the page that are related to vertices and tasks.
trans-unit.target: Note that you now have links at the top of the page that are related to vertices and tasks.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] You can also arrive at this page by going back to __DAG Details__, selecting __Vertex Details__, and then selecting the __Map 1__ vertex.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] You can also arrive at this page by going back to __DAG Details__, selecting __Vertex Details__, and then selecting the __Map 1__ vertex.

trans-unit.source: __Vertex Counters__ displays counter information for this vertex.
trans-unit.target: __Vertex Counters__ displays counter information for this vertex.

trans-unit.source: __Tasks__ displays tasks for this vertex.
trans-unit.target: __Tasks__ displays tasks for this vertex.

trans-unit.source: __Task Attempts__ displays information about attempts to run tasks for this vertex.
trans-unit.target: __Task Attempts__ displays information about attempts to run tasks for this vertex.

trans-unit.source: __Sources & Sinks__ displays data sources and sinks for this vertex.
trans-unit.target: __Sources & Sinks__ displays data sources and sinks for this vertex.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] As with the previous menu, you can scroll the column display for Tasks, Task Attempts, and Sources & Sinks__ to display links to more information for each item.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] As with the previous menu, you can scroll the column display for Tasks, Task Attempts, and Sources & Sinks__ to display links to more information for each item.

trans-unit.source: Select __Tasks__, and then select the item named __00_000000__.
trans-unit.target: Select __Tasks__, and then select the item named __00_000000__.

trans-unit.source: This will display __Task Details__ for this task.
trans-unit.target: This will display __Task Details__ for this task.

trans-unit.source: From this screen, you can view __Task Counters__ and __Task Attempts__.
trans-unit.target: From this screen, you can view __Task Counters__ and __Task Attempts__.

trans-unit.source: ![Task details](./media/hdinsight-debug-tez-ui/taskdetails.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Task details](./media/hdinsight-debug-tez-ui/taskdetails.png)

trans-unit.source: Next Steps
trans-unit.target: Next Steps

trans-unit.source: Now that you have learned how to use the Tez view, learn more about [Using Hive on HDInsight](hdinsight-use-hive.md).
trans-unit.target: Now that you have learned how to use the Tez view, learn more about [Using Hive on HDInsight](hdinsight-use-hive.md).

trans-unit.source: For more detailed technical information on Tez, see the [Tez page at Hortonworks](http://hortonworks.com/hadoop/tez/).
trans-unit.target: For more detailed technical information on Tez, see the [Tez page at Hortonworks](http://hortonworks.com/hadoop/tez/).
